Articles.Content: So while I was playing around with Steams new music player while I was waiting on a pod to re-enter from orbit when it looped to the Portal album on shuffel and started to play Still Alive. Then I had the idea "What would happen if the Kerbals ever discovered GLADOS at Aperture science? Who would survive? Science gathering AI or the the booster exploding Kerbals?"
'Remember when those boosters were exploding and I said 'Goodbye' and you were like 'NO WAY'?'
As part of a previously mentioned required flight protocol, we can no longer lie to you. When this trip is over, you will be... missed.

As part of a previously mentioned required flight protocol, we can no longer lie to you. When this trip is over, you will be... missed.

That's a good one!
On the next moon, try not to touch the ground. It will kill you.

WHOA WHOA WHOA...

steam has a built in music player? i always have to shift+tab to youtube in the steam browser

WHOA WHOA WHOA...

I see what you did there.
